mapper.select: SELECT a.technology_id, a.technology_name, !ISNULL(b.technology_id) AS `using_technology`, b.recruit_level FROM shangshufang_base.technology a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT technology_id, recruit_level FROM shangshufang_customer.technology_using WHERE company_id = #{companyID,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) b ON a.technology_id = b.technology_id ORDER BY a.technology_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shangshufang_customer.technology_using ( company_id, technology_id, recruit_level, create_user, update_user ) VALUES ( #{companyID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{technologyID, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recruitLevel, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
